## Query 1
```sql
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1
```
### Count
1

### Rows
| id | name | email |
| --- | --- | --- |
| 1 | Alice | alice@example.com |

## Query 2
```sql
SELECT count(*) as count FROM users
```
### Count
1

### Rows
| count |
| --- |
| 3 |

results.query: SELECT count(*) as count FROM users
